text: - My name is Kajal Deepak

and I'm general manager
for AWS Audit Manager.
AWS Audit Manager is a service

that is trying to automate
IT audits for AWS customers.

Compliance is hard, there's
nothing fun about it.
It's like reading legal language

and you're trying to figure
out what does this mean
for my IT environment?

And that translation is exactly
what Audit Manager is doing.
And honestly,

I never thought I would be
so excited about IT audits
in my whole life.

We are not the first folks
who are helping our customers
do audits.

Customers are trying
to do IT audits anyways

but we are trying to
reinvent that experience.

We are trying to make it not
a collection of little steps
that have to be manually coordinated,
but instead bring the power of the cloud

to deliver the solution in
a way that is super easy
for customers.
It's a relatively smaller team.

So one of the things that I
would definitely highlight
to anybody who considers joining my team

is that you are gonna
have a very big impact.
You're not gonna be a cog in the wheel
who just has to do one part of the thing.
You are actually gonna be owning things

and you are gonna be
bringing ideas to the table

that will become a real
part of the product
because we are in a greenfield space,
we need ideas from everywhere.

Because the projects and the
goals are ambitious and big,

there is room to demonstrate
that you are the person

who can both come up with the
ideas to solve the problem
and you can deliver on those big goals.
There's a lot of room to innovate
and therefore a lot of room to grow.
(upbeat music)
